Uses of Class
Details

Packages that use Details 
Package Description
model.rsa  

  • Uses of Details in model.rsa

    Methods in model.rsa with annotations of type Details 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String Algorithm.decrypt​(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String privateKey)
    Method decrypts data by using an instance of Cipher class, OAEP with SHA-256 and MGF1 padding and Base64 decoding LinkedList is used to store parts of data, if it is too long
    java.lang.String Algorithm.encrypt​(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String publicKey)
    Method encrypts data by using an instance of Cipher class, OAEP with SHA-256 and MGF1 padding and Base64 encoding LinkedList is used to store parts of data, if it is too long
    private java.security.PrivateKey Algorithm.getPrivateKey​(java.lang.String base64PrivateKey)
    Method converts RSA Private Key from String to PublicKey format using PKCS #8 encoding and instance of KeyFactory class
    private java.security.PublicKey Algorithm.getPublicKey​(java.lang.String base64PublicKey)
    Method converts RSA Public Key from String to PublicKey format using X.509 encoding and instance of KeyFactory class
